Name: GHARP
About the game: GHARP is a stealth-focused first person shooter game about sneaking into a terrorist organisation to prevent an attack. Stop Evil It's time to do justice to all the years of training you've taken to stop terrorist organization, which has deviated from its founding purpose and turned into a terrorist organization that harms humanity and the world. Special Equipment You can develop a special weapon called the manipulator, made by terrorists but now used for good, that can immobilize, infuriate or control terrorists, and even more. Secret Soldier In this mission you have to be as quiet as possible, so you can distract the terrorists with the manipulator or sneak up on them and catch them, now it's up to you what you do when you catch them. Upgrade Upgrade the Manipulator so it will be easier later on. Auxiliary Items When your health is low, do not forget to quickly fill your health with the health kits you can get from the infirmaries or health tents in the regions. Random Encounter While walking your way between the regions, deal with the stray terrorists around.
Meta Title: GHARP: Mar 12, 2022, YediHilal and Full Overview
